content: to fit head sizes small medium large 19-20 21-22 23-24 directions are for smallest size with larger sizes in brackets if there is only one figure it applies to all sizes materials 1 skein any knitting worsted weight yarn 3 5 oz/100 g approx = 220 yards/200 metres four 4 mm double-pointed needles and four 4 5 mm double-pointed needles or size to obtain gauge marker darning needle finished measurements circumference 18 19 25 20 5 length with folded cuff 7 5 8 8 25
